title: Smart motorways complicate business for Welcome Break
text:
It isn’t just drivers fuming about so-called smart motorways - now one of Britain’s biggest service station operators has taken a potshot at them too.

Welcome Break attacked the vast motorway upgrade project in its annual accounts, saying it is hurting business as roadworks cut down the number of potential customers.

The company said: “Smart motorway works (are) adversely affecting traffic volumes in certain locations."

Smart motorways, which in one form or another dispense with the hard shoulder and introduce variable speed limits, have attracted waves of criticism in this year.
